name: CaptureResponse

params.name: amount
params.description: The amount to be debited or captured.

methods.name: setGatewayAvsCode
methods.description: Sets the payment gateway’s AVS (address verification system) code.

params.name: gatewayAvsCode
params.description: Payment gateways that use an AVS system return this code.

params.name: gatewayDate
params.description: The date that communication happened with the gateway.

methods.name: setGatewayMessage
methods.description: Sets information or messages that the gateway returned.

params.name: gatewayMessage
params.description: Information or error messages returned by the gateway.

methods.name: setGatewayReferenceDetails
methods.description: Sets the payment gateway’s reference details.

params.name: gatewayReferenceDetails
params.description: Provides information about the gateway communication.

methods.name: setGatewayReferenceNumber
methods.description: Sets the payment gateway’s reference number.

params.name: gatewayReferenceNumber
params.description: Unique transaction ID created by the payment gateway.

methods.name: setGatewayResultCode
methods.description: Sets the payment gateway’s result code.

params.name: gatewayResultCode
params.description: The gateway result code. You must map this to a Salesforce result code.

methods.name: setGatewayResultCodeDescription
methods.description: Sets the payment gateway’s result code description.

params.name: gatewayResultCodeDescription
params.description: Description of the GatewayResultCode. Provides additional context about the result code that the gateway returned.

params.name: salesforceResultCodeInfo
params.description: SalesforceResultCodeInfoType: commercepayments.SalesforceResultCodeInfo Description of the Salesforce result code value.

description: The payment gateway adapter sends this response for the Capture request type. This class extends AbstractResponse and inherits its methods.
